verses.verse: Behold, the day <WH3117> of the YY <WH3068> cometh <WH935> <WH8804>, and thy spoil <WH7998> shall be divided <WH2505> <WH8795> in the midst <WH7130> of thee.

For I will gather <WH622> <WH8804> all nations <WH1471> against Yerushalayim <WH3389> to battle <WH4421>; and the city <WH5892> shall be taken <WH3920> <WH8738>, and the houses <WH1004> rifled <WH8155> <WH8738>, and the women <WH802> ravished <WH7901> <WH8735> <WH8675> <WH7693> <WH8735>; and half <WH2677> of the city <WH5892> shall go forth <WH3318> <WH8804> into captivity <WH1473>, and the residue <WH3499> of the people <WH5971> shall not be cut off <WH3772> <WH8735> from the city <WH5892>.
Then shall the YY <WH3068> go forth <WH3318> <WH8804>, and fight <WH3898> <WH8738> against those nations <WH1471>, as when <WH3117> he fought <WH3898> <WH8736> in the day <WH3117> of battle <WH7128>.

And his feet <WH7272> shall stand <WH5975> <WH8804> in that day <WH3117> upon the mount <WH2022> of Olives <WH2132>, which is before <WH6440> Yerushalayim <WH3389> on the east <WH6924>, and the mount <WH2022> of Olives <WH2132> shall cleave <WH1234> <WH8738> in the midst <WH2677> thereof toward the east <WH4217> and toward the west <WH3220>, and there shall be a very <WH3966> great <WH1419> valley <WH1516>; and half <WH2677> of the mountain <WH2022> shall remove <WH4185> <WH8804> toward the north <WH6828>, and half <WH2677> of it toward the south <WH5045>.

And ye shall flee <WH5127> <WH8804> to the valley <WH1516> of the mountains <WH2022>; for the valley <WH1516> of the mountains <WH2022> shall reach <WH5060> <WH8686> unto Azal <WH682>: yea, ye shall flee <WH5127> <WH8804>, like as ye fled <WH5127> <WH8804> from before <WH6440> the earthquake <WH7494> in the days <WH3117> of Uziyah-yahu <WH5818> king <WH4428> of Y'hudah <WH3063>: and the YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430> shall come <WH935> <WH8804>, and all the saints <WH6918> with thee.
And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, that the light <WH216> shall not be clear <WH3368>, nor dark <WH7087> <WH8675> <WH7087> <WH8799>:

But it shall be one <WH259> day <WH3117> which shall be known <WH3045> <WH8735> to the YY <WH3068>, not day <WH3117>, nor night <WH3915>: but it shall come to pass, that at evening <WH6153> time <WH6256> it shall be light <WH216>.

And it shall be in that day <WH3117>, that living <WH2416> waters <WH4325> shall go out <WH3318> <WH8799> from Yerushalayim <WH3389>; half <WH2677> of them toward the former <WH6931> sea <WH3220>, and half <WH2677> of them toward the hinder <WH314> sea <WH3220>: in summer <WH7019> and in winter <WH2779> shall it be.
And the YY <WH3068> shall be king <WH4428> over all the earth <WH776>: in that day <WH3117> shall there be one <WH259> YY <WH3068>, and his name <WH8034> one <WH259>.

All the land <WH776> shall be turned <WH5437> <WH8735> as a plain <WH6160> from Geba <WH1387> to Rimmon <WH7417> south <WH5045> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>: and it shall be lifted up <WH7213> <WH8804>, and inhabited <WH3427> <WH8804> in her place, from Binyamin's <WH1144> gate <WH8179> unto the place <WH4725> of the first <WH7223> gate <WH8179>, unto the corner <WH6434> gate <WH8179>, and from the tower <WH4026> of Hananeel <WH2606> unto the king's <WH4428> winepresses <WH3342>.
And men shall dwell <WH3427> <WH8804> in it, and there shall be no more utter destruction <WH2764>; but Yerushalayim <WH3389> shall be safely <WH983> inhabited <WH3427> <WH8804>.

And this shall be the plague <WH4046> wherewith the YY <WH3068> will smite <WH5062> <WH8799> all the people <WH5971> that have fought <WH6633> <WH8804> against Yerushalayim <WH3389>; Their flesh <WH1320> shall consume away <WH4743> <WH8687> while they stand <WH5975> <WH8802> upon their feet <WH7272>, and their eyes <WH5869> shall consume away <WH4743> <WH8735> in their holes <WH2356>, and their tongue <WH3956> shall consume away <WH4743> <WH8735> in their mouth <WH6310>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, that a great <WH7227> tumult <WH4103> from the YY <WH3068> shall be among them; and they shall lay hold <WH2388> <WH8689> every one <WH376> on the hand <WH3027> of his neighbour <WH7453>, and his hand <WH3027> shall rise up <WH5927> <WH8804> against the hand <WH3027> of his neighbour <WH7453>.

And Y'hudah <WH3063> also shall fight <WH3898> <WH8735> at Yerushalayim <WH3389>; and the wealth <WH2428> of all the heathen <WH1471> round about <WH5439> shall be gathered together <WH622> <WH8795>, gold <WH2091>, and silver <WH3701>, and apparel <WH899>, in great <WH3966> abundance <WH7230>.

And so shall be the plague <WH4046> of the horse <WH5483>, of the mule <WH6505>, of the camel <WH1581>, and of the ass <WH2543>, and of all the beasts <WH929> that shall be in these <WH1992> tents <WH4264>, as this plague <WH4046>.

And it shall come to pass, that every one that is left <WH3498> <WH8737> of all the nations <WH1471> which came <WH935> <WH8802> against Yerushalayim <WH3389> shall even go up <WH5927> <WH8804> from <WH1767> year <WH8141> to year <WH8141> to worship <WH7812> <WH8692> the King <WH4428>, the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, and to keep <WH2287> <WH8800> the feast <WH2282> of tabernacles <WH5521>.

And it shall be, that whoso will not come up <WH5927> <WH8799> of all the families <WH4940> of the earth <WH776> unto Yerushalayim <WH3389> to worship <WH7812> <WH8692> the King <WH4428>, the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, even upon them shall be no rain <WH1653>.

And if the family <WH4940> of Egypt <WH4714> go not up <WH5927> <WH8799>, and come <WH935> <WH8804> not, that have no rain; there shall be the plague <WH4046>, wherewith the YY <WH3068> will smite <WH5062> <WH8799> the heathen <WH1471> that come not up <WH5927> <WH8799> to keep <WH2287> <WH8800> the feast <WH2282> of tabernacles <WH5521>.

This shall be the punishment <WH2403> of Egypt <WH4714>, and the punishment <WH2403> of all nations <WH1471> that come not up <WH5927> <WH8799> to keep <WH2287> <WH8800> the feast <WH2282> of tabernacles <WH5521>.

In that day <WH3117> shall there be upon the bells <WH4698> of the horses <WH5483>, HOLINESS <WH6944> UNTO THE YY <WH3068>; and the pots <WH5518> in the YY'S <WH3068> house <WH1004> shall be like the bowls <WH4219> before <WH6440> the altar <WH4196>.

Yea, every pot <WH5518> in Yerushalayim <WH3389> and in Y'hudah <WH3063> shall be holiness <WH6944> unto the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>: and all they that sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8802> shall come <WH935> <WH8804> and take <WH3947> <WH8804> of them, and seethe <WH1310> <WH8765> therein: and in that day <WH3117> there shall be no more the Kanahanite <WH3669> in the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>.
